DOC.brief_summary: The study prospective double blind . In clinic , patient undergoing inguinal hernia surgery meet criterion inclusion study agree participate study randomize two group . In first group patient receive Nitrous Oxide In second group patient receive oxygen general anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Nitrous Oxide On Acute Postoperative Pain Opioid Consumption Chronic Pain After Inguinal Hernia Repair Surgery
DOC.criteria: 18 65 year old time first procedure American Society Anesthesiologists physical status I II Inguinal hernia repair surgery undergo general anesthesia Neuropathic disease Chronic opioid user Contraindication Nitrous Oxide receive Consent obtain patient Psychiatric disorder Current recent drug abuse ( within past 6 month ) .
